112.content: One day you were just sitting in your living room, minding your own business. You were watching your favorite movie ever, Monsters Inc. Until your television starts to shake violently and a bright light comes out of your television set, soon you black out. Then later you wake up very groggy and look around and you're shocked,you're in some kind of extremely large locker room that looks very metallic and kind of dark. It's very scary in here and the locker room is much bigger than you, it's like this place was designed for people who are twenty feet tall, but unknown to you, the place wasn't built large at all, oh no, no, the real fact of the matter is that you've been shrunk to about half your height so now you are only three feet tall at best. You look around and panic until you stop and hear loud stomping approaching you. Coming around one of the lockers is... you can't believe it. It's Sully from Monsters Inc. The huge blue behemoth looks at you with a grin, "Well, well, well what do we have here?" The blue monster grins approaching you with a terrifying grin on his face, he was one scary looking monster, even when he wasn't trying. You quiver in front of him, what happens now?
112.title: Big Blue Beast

1121.content:
Sully picks you up and takes you home. He tosses you onto his old, beaten up recliner that reeks of monster ass and farts.

Sully looks down at you and grins. "I've been on my feet all day," he says, heaving a huge sigh and turning around. "I'll take a load off and watch some TV."

Sully's giant form crashes down on you as he lets himself fall into his favorite chair. You're squashed under his 750 pound frame as he grinds his ass down on you. He props his feet up and leans back, further increasing the pressure on you.

"Wait a second," Sully says as he jumps out of his seat. He snatches you up in his paw and grins again. "This will be hilarious!" He goes to the kitchen and rummages through a drawer before he pulls out some duct tape. He takes you back to his seat and tosses you down before he duct tapes you to the seat facing up.

Then...
1121.title: He turns around and sits on you

1122.content:
You hear Sully's stomach growl "Well looks like I'm hungry and I've got a great meal right here." Sullivan grabs you and covers your mouth before you can scream, not like anyone will help you anyway. Your in their world. "Make sure to struggle and I'll go easy on you." Sully whispered, and he removed his hand(paw?). Pulling your head in, he kisses you on the lips.

You blush at what the monster is doing and feel his tongue enter your mouth. Then his jaws open wide and you can see the fangs within, glistening with saliva. His tongue coming out and dragging acrosss your face. Then he shoves your head in his mouth and closes his lips on your neck. You can feel the tongue caress and slather your face, as you hear the blue and purple furry monster savour your taste.

Sully opens his jaws wider and shoves you in further, while swallowing your head. His tongue is licking across your chest, which you now realize is bare. He must have torn your shirt off. Sully takes another swallow bringing your body in further and you feel him removing your socks, shoes, and pants. He then starts to lick and even lightly nibble your waist line. Taking another swallow, only your flailing legs are sticking out of his mouth.

Your head is in his chest, you can hear his heart beating next to your ear. Your body is slowly being massaged as the monster swallows you down. Sully slurps your legs like spaghetti, until only your feet are sticking out. He takes a few more seconds to savor your feet, causing you to giggle from the feeling. And makes a final swallow, sending you into his stomach. You slide into his stomach and are forced into a fetal position as your body enters. You adjust yourself to be upright "Oh, that feels good. Now keep struggling while I digest you."

Hearing his muffled words you panic and begin to struggle wildly. Sully looks down at his stomach, only slightly bulging out. But still has a grin as he feels the human struggle even more. Deciding to head home, he tells whoever asks that he had a big lunch. Entering his home, he lays on his bed and decides to take a nap. You however are getting tired and stop moving, hearing the monster snoring. Too tired to move you took a nap yourself and wake up a few hours later to find yourself...
1122.title: His belly grumbles, he decides to eat you all up

11222.content:
You wake up and wonder why your alive. Focusing on your surroundings, before ooening your eyes, you notice your on a very massive bed. And there's a furry arm wrapped around you, holding you to a soft and furry body. Opening your eyes and look around, seeing your in a big (to you) bedroom. And the arm is the monster that ate you, Sullivan who was looking right at you.

He grins "Hey your up. How was it in my stomach?" "Why aren't I dead? You said you would digest me." You say, "Hahahah, since you struggled so hard, I know you believed me. But no, I wasn't going to digest you. I just wanted to get a rub on the inside." He said. "If you wanted a rub amd weren't going to kill me, you could've just asked." "But where would the fun in that be? I was just kidding around. I wouldn't actually kill you. If you never returned to your world, youe kind would get suspicious. And we could be discovered."

You respond sadly "No one would miss me, my mother abandoned me, I had no friends throughout school or college. And my job has me sit at home and answer calls on how to set up their internet. I've had no one for my entire life." Sully pulls you closer to his body and holds you with both arms "I'm so sorry. So if you went missing, no one noticed." You nod your head with tears in your eyes. "Then your not leaving, your staying here." "What about the other monsters, will they be ok with a human here?" You ask

"Not a problem, ever since we discovered the truth with Boo, long story. We found out you humans are as dangerous as we thought. I'll just need to introduce you to my world, after some time passes. But for now you'll stay with me. My roommate moved out, since he got married and I could use the company. That ok with you?" He asked, "Yeah that's fine. One question, before you ate me, you kissed me. Why?"

"That's easy, other than Boo, you are really cute, even for a guy" You blush at his words and respond "Well thanks, even though your a monster, your pretty cute yourself. But your very soft." "Well at least you like my fur, lets grab something to eat and then we can talk some more or watch some T.V. After getting up and getting dressed, he brought your clothes, you both head into his kitchen, where he hands you some food. And after being hesitant for a few seconds, you found the food interesting and ate in silence. "*Uurrp, Ah that's delicious, so what did you want to do?"
11222.title: Lying right next to him

112221.content:
"Why don't we just talk. My name's Axel. You say, "Nice to meet you Axel, my name's James P. Sullivan, but my friends call me Sully." You already knew this, but you weren't sure how to explain that you were in a movie. And explaining how you knew him, would only confuse him greatly. So you decided to pretend that your ignorant. "Hi Sully, what do you do for work?" Knowing what the answer was.

"Well I am the boss of a company called Monster's Inc. Its a place where we collect power to distribute it to the city. We used to scare little kids of your world, to obtain the power. But I found out that a child's laughter is 50x more powerful than screams. I explained my discovery and how I knew, and sure enough, we opened again. I became boss and we have plenty of power for the city, enough for the next 10 years. My partner and friend Mikey is one of the top monsters to make kids laugh. Right now, he's on his honeymoon with Cecilia. What about you?" Sully asked

"As I said before, my job has me working from home. I would wait for my phone to ring and tell people how to connect to the internet. Setup their Wi-Fi and more. Only time I left my home is to get food." You say, Sully looks at you and you can see sadness in his eyes. "Wow, that sounds really lonely. I know you said all this before. But that just sounds worse than what I thought."

You and Sully continue to talk for a few more hours, until the sun goes down. "Well Axel, its time for bed." "Ok, where do I sleep?" "From what you told me. Your not sleeping by yourself ever again. You'll sleep with me in my bed. Come on." You get up and follow Sully back into his room and get ready for bed. Thankful that he has a spare toothbrush for you to use. And walking in to see him laying in bed. "Come on, don't be shy and you can remove your clothes. My fur and blanket will provide you with enough warmth."

Removing your clothes, until your in your briefs, you fold them and set them down somewhere for the next day. Then getting in bed and laying next to the furry monster, you use his upper arm as your pillow and he wraps the rest around you and pulls the blanket over both of you. "Good night Axel, sweet nightmares." Sully kisses you on the cheek, causing you to blush again and you both fall asleep.
112221.title: Talk

1122212.content:
32 days have passed, since you came to Sully's world. 2 weeks after you had arrived, Sully took you to work with him. The monsters were startled at first when they saw you, but relaxed when you assured them that their world would not be discovered. And most felt sorry for you, when they heard how lonely your life was. You would help every now and then, telling the monsters what kids liked to laugh at and in a few days were loved by everyone.

Mikey and Cecelia returned from their honeymoon and also met you. They gave you the same kindness and caring as everyone else. And since Mikey was moving out of his old apartment, it would be just you and Sully. You noticed the more time you spent with Sully, the more intimate he became. He never says anything to you, but he does kiss you a lot. He hasn't eaten you since that one time, but you kinda wish he does.

Today was both of your days off and while you were awake, Sully was still sleeping. And you were thinking of a way to get Sully to eat you again. Without noticing, Sully snuck up behind you and put your head in his mouth. Scaring the crap out of you.

Light is revealed to your eyes, as Sully lets go of your head. "Haha haha, got you Axel." "Did you really have to do that Sully, you could've asked." "What? I thought you were terrified to be in my stomach. You really want to go back in?" 'Well no dodging it now' you thought. "Yes Sully, I was terrified, but when you told me that I wasn't going to die. I realized that I was comfortable in your stomach." "Alright, I'll eat you again. But not today, we need to to shopping. We're low on food."

So you and Sully got showered and you got dressed. Because you chose to stay in Sully' world for the rest of your life. The monsters made some clothes just for you.
1122212.title: One month later

11222122.content:
You spent about 5 hours shopping and greeting all the new friends you've made. Finally you return home and put everything away. Not too happy that the shampoo and body wash only have foul odors. You would at least like a natural shampoo with no smell, instead of smelling like 2 week old garbage.

Sully crashed on the sofa "Ahh, finally home. What are we gonna do now?" He asked. You were behind him and decided to remove your clothes 'Now or never, besides he could use a good meal'. Finished stripping, you walk behind the big behemoth and wrap your arms around his neck. "How about you grab a bite to eat, I know what'll fill your big ol' belly."

"Really? Well why don't you get started and I'll wait here while its ready." "You don't have to wait, its ready now." Unwrapping your arms, you walk around and sit on his furry lap. "Its rude to let your food get cold." You say, "Well since you put it that way, I'll make sure to savor my food all the way down."

Sully grabs you and says "But your going in another way, I'll eat you tomorrow." Curious by what he meant, you soon understand when he stands up and turns around. As he sits you realize that your nose is in the direction of his hole. When he sat down, you inhaled through your nose, but are surprised to find that it smells sweet. Pleasant by that surprise, you fail to notice his hole has opened up, to welcome your head.

Opening your eyes, after hearing Sully moan, you only see darkness. Sully continues to sit and shoves you in further. You can feel his anal muscles massaging in a different way, as your shoved in up instead of down. You knew Sully stood up, since you felt your legs leave the floor and decided to put your feet on his sofa and shove yourself in further. You could feel him growling, by the vibrations of his body, and felt him grasp your feet.

Instead of shoving them in, his claws lightly scratched your feet, causing you to squirm and giggle as he did so. Sully moaned, knowing this would be your reaction 'Axel's squrming is just as good as when he's going down my throat. Too bad I can't taste him though.' Sully thought. A few minutes of tickling later he shoved your feet into his hole and sat back down. Feeling his stomach fill up again with you inside.

"Well that was fun Axel. Your gonna stay in there for the rest of the day. Don't worry I'll let you out and have you for dinner tomorrow. But now *Yawn* I could use some sleep." Not going anywhere, you decide to fall asleep yourself.
11222122.title: Later on

12111.content:
You run across the slimy tongue, desperate to get pass Terk's lips before she closes her mouth. As the opening becomes smaller and smaller you leap on to Terk's crooked and dirty teeth.

As if you were a character in an action movie, you jump off of the tooth and past the gorilla's lips. You seek Terk's face get farther and farther away as you sent free falling towards your probable doom. She still hasn't noticed you which might be for the best since she might think that you're food and put you back in her mouth covering you in her rancid breath.

This train of thought comes to a screeching halt when you land on a soft and bouncy surface. As you land, you are immediately bounced into the air again. The ground jiggles when you land. You look around you and see Terk's black furry legs below. You try to stand up but fall back down when the constant moving disorientates you.

That's when you realize that you're standing on Terk's plump belly and the moving is her snoring as she's fallen asleep.

This could be your chance to explore her body and see the magnificence of a giant gorilla.
12111.title: Soft landing.

121112.content:
You decide to get a closer look at her feet, for whatever reason. It seems she's in a pretty heavy sleep, so you should be good to go. But before doing that, you first have to get off of her big belly.

Every move you made caused her stomach to slosh around, so you stepped very carefully as to not make sudden movements. But this would be a challenge, as her stomach was more fat than muscle, and was easily movable. You tried your best to keep still as you edged over to her thigh.

But she jerked in her sleep, as indicated by a sharp snort and unexpected shifting of her body. This caused you to trip and roll off of her belly before landing on her thigh, sliding down to her foot. Thankfully, you were able to stop where the shin and the top of the foot met. You shimmed down from her shin and onto the ground, to get a better view of her feet.

As you walked near her right foot, you got a sense of scale as to just how small you are. Her right foot was on its side, and her left was straight up in the air, both bigger than you were and twitching slightly. Her right foot seemed easier to reach, so you decided to start there.

You could see more detail in the sole of her foot as you walked closer, little wrinkles and specks of dust becoming more evident. She clearly walked around quite a bit, and with little concern for what might appear there. There were leaves, blades of grass, and even some sweat. A bit muskier than imagined, but bearable at a distance. You decided to try and peel one of the grass blades off to look at it better, but touching her foot caused her to clench her toes in response, trapping you in between them. You were stuck. Did she know you were there?
121112.title: Terk's Feet

1211121.content: Terk woke up with a stretch and a yawn. She stretched her whole body out, spreading her hands and clenching her toes. Just when her toes clenched though she felt something small and wiggly between them, it felt as if a little bug were trying to be free from between her smelly toes. She glanced at them and clenched again when she felt more wiggling. She had no idea what was between them, but everytime she would shift or scrunch her chubby toes she felt the thing in between struggle even more to be free. Finally Terk reached in between the colossal digits to see what she had caught, and is stunned to see a tiny human on between her fingers. No wonder his struggles registered as a bugs, he really was as tiny as an ant and he must have struggled as hard as he could between her digits to be found. "Wow, you're super duper tiny, little guy! How did you become so small?", she asked the little man. He tried to reply frantically but he was too tiny to be heard. "Ok little guy whatever you say.", she said dismissively, clearly not caring about the tiny bugs life story. She seemed to have a concentrated expression on her huge gorilla face, she was staring intently at you like she were deciding what she wanted you to do for her. Finally she exclaimed an "AHHA!", as if she had just gotten the perfect idea. " Well well little bug person, I can take care of you from now on, but you have to be my..."
1211121.title: She woke up!

12111211.content: Without another word you were lowered down to the ground at her feet. It was intimidating to say the least, being so tiny and on the ground before the giantess gorillas watchful gaze. The moment you were on the floor Terk extended her massive gorilla paws towards your diminutive form, trapping you between the soles of both her feet. They rose far above you and rested on either side, slowly shifting and scrunching her soles and toes with an absentminded ease. You looked at the giant sole to your left and admired it for all of its scrunching and dirt trapping wrinkles, noticing how tiny amounts would crumble and rain off her sole at the slightest twitch. Terk clearly didnt have much regard for her foot hygiene and you got the impression this job was purely for her amusement. Just as you thought this her foot wiggled impatiently as the giantess spoke "So are ya gonna clean my stinky paws or stare at em all day, little man?" Without another moments hesitation you start working the huge soles with your tiny hands, getting into the crevices that trapped dirt and clearing them out. You worked for hours on her massive paws, cleaning out all the debris on the bottom of her sole. Moving onto the toes you stuck your hands as far between them as you could as you scoop all the grime you could from deep between her digits. Terk giggled as your struggles between her colossal toes tickled her, causing her to involuntarily scrunch them and you between them. It was slow going because every pair of toes you would get played with roughly when you inevitably tickled in between them. Finally after what seems like an eternity you finish with both of her feet looking better than ever. You know this victory is short lived however because the moment Terk would walk again they would go back to being just as dirty as before. You squeaked in surprise as you felt yourself being pinched and lifted by Terk once again. "Wow little fella, you did a pretty good job on my feet, they haven't been so clean in awhile!", she exclaimed. " Now that you're done, let's..."
12111211.title: "Foot cleaner!"

121112112.content: "But I can't really risk you running away, I may never find a toy like you ever again." Suddenly Terk's eyes lit up and a big toothy smile spread across her wide mouth at your direction. You think she may have your sleeping arrangements in mind. "You're gonna nap..."

You woke to find out that you were hanging by your shirt?!
You were able to look around you and found that you were being carried by a giant lion! You then recognized your captor to be Nuka, an antagonist in the second lion king movie.
You saw that Nuka was carrying you to a small cave near the termite mound.
Your captor laid his mouth down on the cave floor, but before you were able to escape, he put his large smelly paw on your tiny body stopping you from escaping.
He let out a loud chuckle. “So what do we have here?” He asked you. “Your the size of a mouse but you certainly don’t look like a mouse. Maybe you’ll taste like one.” He pondered.
“Hm. You seem rare. Maybe I should keep you? But of course I am pretty hungry. I could just eat you.” He continued.
You shuddered as you realized that he had plans to eat you!
He then smiles evilly and pulls you up from the ground by your shirt and lowered you into his hot maw, tasting you. You screamed for mercy as he tasted your flavor, deciding what to do to you.
152332322121.title: Nuka’s Prize.

15513221.content:
You had come to hawaii for vacation, but you had never expected it to come to this. Just moments, you had been strolling across the beach during a beautiful sunset when you started to hear some sort of booming sound. You only had a seconds notice as you turned around to see some small creature bump into you and knock you over. What happened next was unexplainable, as you picked your head out of the sand and realized the world had become much, MUCH larger than you. The small creature was no where to be seen as you felt your head reeling.

Taking a moment to take in what just happened, you hear a large thumping sound as you look backwards to see what was causing it. "Blast, that abomination got away!" A large, deep voice booms above as you see the building sized alien stare down at you. "Maybe I can follow its footpr- hello what do we have here!" you see the large grey fingers come down and chase after you. You try to get up and run, but as soon as you feel your feet on the sand again, your clutched in a dark, cramped world. Now being slightly squeezed, you wonder what'll happen next, as your hot, hand prison keeps you swinging back and forth, which felt like it went on for hours.

Finally, as the hand opens, the fingers reposition themselves so that you are dangling once more. "Hmm, the residual contact from that experiment must have shrunk this human." You hear the deep voice once more. You see the large, whale aliens face contort into a smirk. "Well, with Rueben not around, I guess I can do anything with this little guy! Haha!" You had been so transfixed on looking around your environment, which must have been his ship, you had time to notice that you we're about to be deposited into-
15513221.title: Experiment gone wrong

155222222222222222222111.content:
You awoke and saw yourself in a giant jungle wiry grass 4 times the size as you!
Before, you were just laying in your bed and now you were in a jungle? “This must be a dream!” You thought to yourself. But oh, how wrong you were.

You began to walk around the giant jungle, not knowing where you were going and hoping not to get eaten by a bigger creature.
You walked for what it felt like for twenty minutes before you saw a giant tree. And sleeping on that tree was Mowgli!
“This must be a dream!” You told yourself again.
It was Mowgli, the young boy from The Jungle Book. A film you used to love when you were young and you remembered that Mowgli used to be your imaginary friend.
The giant Mowgli smiled as he slept, dreaming something wonderful.
You began to make your way to the giant boy, questioning everything you knew.
How do you contact him? Should you go to his feet or one of his legs and climb up, or maybe just wait and see what happens?
155222222222222222222111.title: The giant man cub.
